Commentary: he finds swing right away. Good-length inswinger, Kayes does not cover for the movement and squirts an inside edge to the midwicket region
Commentary_short: Malinga to Imrul Kayes, no run

Commentary: too full and outside off, Kayes presses forward, drives, but can't get it past cover
Commentary_short: Malinga to Imrul Kayes, no run

Commentary: there comes the inswinging yorker, hunting for the base of off stump, Kayes jams his bat down in time and toe-ends the ball to cover
Commentary_short: Malinga to Imrul Kayes, no run

Commentary: pitched up on off, driven up the up to mid-off for one. Kayes finds some breathing space at the other end
Commentary_short: Malinga to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

Commentary: full and wide outside off - probably wider than a set of stumps outside off - Sarkar loves width. He bends his knee and flays it over the top of point
Commentary_short: Malinga to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs

Commentary: wide of the crease, near yorker, swerves in on middle and leg, Sarkar jabs his bat down and keeps it out
Commentary_short: Malinga to Soumya Sarkar, no run

Commentary: on a length and angling away outside off, opens the bat-face and guides it towards point
Commentary_short: Kulasekara to Imrul Kayes, no run

Commentary: Kayes shimmies out, the bowler drags his length back on the stumps, pushed to mid-on, who is hanging back
Commentary_short: Kulasekara to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

Commentary: Sarkar now jumps down the track, meets a short ball. He has a big mow, does not meet the pitch, and ends up dragging an inside edge away to deep midwicket

Commentary: one shimmy too many? Uses his feet, Kulasekara goes shorter on middle and leg and pings the thigh pad
Commentary_short: Kulasekara to Imrul Kayes, no run

Commentary: Kayes steps away outside leg, this is full on middle. The batsman, having made room, crashes a drive through extra cover
Commentary_short: Kulasekara to Imrul Kayes, FOUR runs

Commentary: and again! Kayes backs away outside leg, opens up the off side, this is full on the stumps again. Full-toss, in fact. Same treatment. The ball isn't swinging or seaming for Kulasekara
Commentary_short: Kulasekara to Imrul Kayes, FOUR runs

Commentary: the left-hander skips out and whips a short ball down to long-on

Commentary: darted down leg, left alone, leg-side wide

Commentary: short on off stump, chopped away from there to backward point
Commentary_short: Munaweera to Imrul Kayes, no run

Commentary: slides on outside off, no turn. Kayes goes over the top again. Lifts it confidently over extra cover again

Commentary: half-tracker outside off, Kayes responds with a back-foot swat to deep midwicket

Commentary: quick fizzer, 102ks, hustles Sarkar for pace. Whisked to mid-on

Commentary: hurled down leg. wide

Commentary: really full and wide outside off, Sarkar likes width. He throws his bat at the ball and ends up carving it over extra cover

Commentary: length ball wide outside off,  Kayes frees his arms and lofts it through the line. Up and over extra cover. Hits the ad skirting on the flush. First six of the night

Commentary: full, angled in, swings in, worked to midwicket
Commentary_short: Sanjaya to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

Commentary: 122ks slower length ball outside off, Sarkar swishes early and misses

Commentary: Sarkar forays down the track, he is ready for this short ball on middle. Smacked over the covers again. 18 runs off the over. Bangladesh motoring along

Commentary: length ball, slides in with the arm, pushed to midwicket on the back foot

Commentary: evades the outstretched hands of a leaping mid-off. Malinga misses his length. Full and outside off,  the batsman miscues a lofted drive.  Sliced in the air. Tharanga moves to his right, does so late, and does not get a hand to the ball

Commentary: Malinga attempts a cutter, grips in the surface, and bounces at Sarkar, who had no clue about this change-up. Hits the thigh

Commentary: oh dear! Mashrafe bags a golden duck in his last T20 international. Full on middle, dips at the batsman. Mashrafe looks to late-cut it down towards third man from the stumps. Poor shot selection. Malinga rejoices. The middle stump is tilted back
Commentary_short: Malinga to Mashrafe Mortaza, OUT

Commentary: Malinga does it. He claims a hat-trick! This is another Malinga special. The RPS erupts. The devilish dipper, 119ks, Mehedi gone for a golden duck on his T20I debut. Full, slow, and straight. Mehedi plays around his front pad, does so early, pinned in front. This is Malinga's fourth hat-trick in international cricket. What a bowler and he has done it without the yorker; just three straight slow dippers
Commentary_short: Malinga to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, OUT
Dismissal_text: Mehidy Hasan Miraz lbw b Malinga 0 (1b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0.00

Commentary: and he strikes full ball. Hossain takes it on the rebound. Full and wide outside off, Kapu drives hard, drives in the air. The ball flew to Hossain  at cover. He could not close his fingers around the fast-travelling ball. He somehow clutches the ball against his throat. The ball bobbles up and then he stretches his right hand, completing the catch
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Gunaratne, OUT
Dismissal_text: DAS Gunaratne c Mosaddek Hossain b Mustafizur Rahman 0 (1b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0.00

Commentary: full and very wide outside off, flayed away to point. This flew towards the throat of Sarkar. He somehow hangs onto the catch. Stinging blow. SL five down inside Powerplay
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Siriwardana, OUT
Dismissal_text: TAM Siriwardana c Soumya Sarkar b Mustafizur Rahman 0 (1b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0.00

Commentary: Stumping chance. The TV umpire has been called in. This looks out and Thisara walks off. Thisara skipped out, Shakib was wary of it. He fired it flatter and wider outside off. Thisara can't reach out and connect with a wild leg-side mow. He loses his balance and can't ground his back foot in time. Mushfiq does the rest

Commentary: Mashrafe misses a run-out chance. The batsman shuffles across off and laps it away to long leg. There is a miscommunication between the wickets. Kapu wants two, Prasanna doesn't. The throw from Sarkar is flat to Mashrafe. He is too eager to pick up the ball and disturb the stumps. He does not collect the ball cleanly and breaks the stumps without the ball. Kapu gets away

Commentary: Bangladesh send-off Mashrafe with a series-levelling victory. Mashrafe takes his cap off and takes hugs from his team-mates. Another sliced hit and long-off gets under this. Saifuddin, meanwhile, does the star man pose à la Afridi
